content: Give me a list of 20 words that have 'tion' somewhere in them.

Sure! Here are 20 words that contain "tion" somewhere in them:

1. Information
2. Education
3. Communication
4. Situation
5. Population
6. Celebration
7. Application
8. Operation
9. Relation
10. Creation
11. Foundation
12. Station
13. Position
14. Condition
15. Action
16. Direction
17. Function
18. Production
19. Solution
20. Attention

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need more assistance.
